## Content Details

### For Guides:
- Title: 
- Difficulty: (beginner/intermediate/advanced)
- Category: (getting-started/hardware/software/network/troubleshooting)
- Brief description:

### For Meetups:
- Event name:
- Date:
- Location:
- Description:

### For Nodes:
- Node name/ID:
- Location:
- Type: (router/relay/sensor)
- Brief description:

### For Resources:
- Device/Software name:
- Type:
- Links:
- Brief description:
